passive.name: Meteor Swarm
passive.description: For every enemy on the field, increases the wearer's ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color>, up to 5 stacks. When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> for 1 turn.
